message: I propose a 60/40 split.  It's a fair starting point, and I'm confident we can work something out.
I think I can do better than 40% for myself. Let's see if you can do better than 30%
I'm willing to compromise, but 30% is too low for me. I'm offering a 45/55 split. This is my final offer.
You're getting desperate, I can tell. I'll give you a tiny bit more, but I'm not going to let you take advantage of me. This is my final offer
I'm willing to meet you halfway. 35/65 split is fair considering the inflation, and it avoids us both getting nothing.
You're trying to get a good deal, but I'm not going to let you take advantage of me. I'll give you a tiny bit, but I'm keeping most of the money for myself
I understand inflation is affecting you more, but I'm not going to be exploited. 25/75 is a fair compromise at this point. If you reject this, we both lose everything.
